body_html:
My guess is that tensorflow is currently developing a c-api which then can be used with swig to build wrappers for multiple languages.
Take a look at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commits/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h

body:
My guess is that  tensorflow is currently developing a c-api which then can be used with swig to build wrappers for multiple languages.
Take a look at: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commits/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h
